summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 35th Avenue South, from Alaska Street to Oregon Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12384 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
